title: CECRI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 39 Apprentice Posts
description: Central Electrochemical Research Institute (CECRI) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 39 Apprentice, Graduate Apprentice Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the ITI, Diploma, B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the CECRI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply fo...
